Model training (follows tutorial https://raw.githack.com/bioFAM/MOFA2_tutorials/master/R_tutorials/getting_started_R.html)

```{r}
require(data.table)
require(MOFA2)
require(purrr)
require(ggplot2)
require(cowplot)
require(MOFAdata)
```
Load data

```{r}
data <- make_example_data(
  n_views = 3, 
  n_samples = 15, 
  n_features = 1000, 
  n_factors = 10
)[[1]]
MOFAobject <- create_mofa(data)
```
